'''Poisonous Potato Add-On''' is an official [[add-on]] developed by ''Jigarbov Productions'' released alongside [[Java Edition 24w14potato]] as part of the ''Poisonous Potato'' [[April Fools' Day]] event in 2024.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
* [[File:Poisonous Potato Bundle.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Poisonous Potato Bundle
** Same capacity as a regular [[bundle]].
** There is no opened poisonous potato bundle texture.
* [[File:Baked Poisonous Potato.png|32px]] Baked Poisonous Potato
** Obtained by cooking poisonous potato in a [[furnace]].
** Not compatible with [[smoker]].
** Can be eaten to restore {{hunger|5}} hunger and gives 3 to 4 random positive effects. The positive effects are always level 5 and last for 30 seconds.
*[[File:Explosive Poisonous Potato.png|32px]] Explosive Poisonous Potato
**If {{Control|used}}, it is thrown and generates a colossal [[explosion]].
**Crafted from 1 poisonous potato, 4 gunpowder and 4 redstone dust.
* [[File:Poisonous Potato Nubs.png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Nubs
**Crafted from a poisonous potato.
**When {{Control|used}}, it is thrown and infects entities with [[poison]].
**[[File:Explosive Poisonous Potato Nubs.png|32px]] Explosive Poisonous Potato Nubs
**Crafted from 7 poisonous potato nubs, 1 redstone dust, and 1 gunpowder.
**When {{Control|used}}, it is thrown and creates a small explosion.
* [[File:Sprouted Poisonous Potato Nubs.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Sprouted Poisonous Potato Nubs
* [[File:Sprouted Explosive Poisonous Potato Nubs.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Sprouted Explosive Poisonous Potato Nubs
* Poisonous Potato Armor
** [[File:Poisonous Potato Helmet.png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Helmet
** [[File:Poisonous Potato Chestplate (add-on).png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Chestplate
** [[File:Poisonous Potato Leggings.png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Leggings
** [[File:Poisonous Potato Boots.png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Boots
** Each piece grants double the [[armor point]]s of [[diamond armor|diamond]]/[[netherite armor]], with the helmet and boots granting {{armor|6}} points each, the chestplate {{armor|16}}, and the leggings {{armor|12}}.{{more information needed|What about armor toughness and durability?}}
** When the full set is equipped, every mob within a radius{{more information needed|What is the size of the radius?}} of the player are inflicted with a high level of [[Fatal Poison]]{{More information needed|What level and duration?}}
* [[File:Poisonous Potato Guide.png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Guide
** Guides the player on how to smelt baked poisonous potatoes and craft poisonous potato blocks, poisonous potato powered wooden swords, poisonous potato powered armor, and poisonous potato powered minecarts.
** Gives the credits for the add-on.
* {{Animate|Poisonous Potato Powered Wooden Sword.png; Poisonous Potato Powered Stone Sword.png; Poisonous Potato Powered Iron Sword.png; Poisonous Potato Powered Golden Sword.png; Poisonous Potato Powered Diamond Sword.png; Poisonous Potato Powered Netherite Sword.png|32px}} Poisonous Potato Powered Sword
** Has wooden, stone, iron, golden, diamond, and netherite variants.
** Has twice the attack damage from normal swords.
** Inflicts a high level of [[Fatal Poison]]{{more information needed|Level and duration?}}
* [[File:Poisonous Potato Stew.png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Stew
* [[File:Wrench.png|32px]] Wrench
** Part of all packs by Jigarbov.{{more information needed|What is its purpose?}}

* [[File:Poisonous Potato Balloon.png|32px]][[File:Poisonous Potato Balloon (entity).gif|32px]] Poisonous Potato Balloon
** Can be ridden
* [[File:Poisonous Potato Chair.png|32px]][[File:Poisonous Potato Chair (entity).png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Chair
* [[File:Poisonous Potato Powered Minecart.png|32px]][[File:Poisonous Potato Powered Minecart (entity).png|32px]] Poisonous Potato Powered Minecart
** Does not need rails to use or place, nor does it interact with them.

==== Mobs ====
* [[File:Mutato.png|32px]] Mutato 
** A neutral mob, which can be both crafted or spawned by {{control|breaking}} [[potato]] crops with 2% chance. 
*** Its spawn egg is crafted from 1 poisonous potato, 1 [[potion of Regeneration]] and 7 [[vine]]s.
** Mutato have {{hp|60}} health points and {{hp|7}} damage points + [[Poison]] effect on 15 seconds 
** Player can tame mutato by [[potato]] or [[poisonous potato]].
** Has a chance of dropping a Jumbo Poisonous Potato.
* [[File:Tubber Trekkers Render.png|32px]] Tuber Trekkers 
** Crafted from 2 poisonous potatoes and 4 vines.
** Ridable.
** Has very high speed and jump height.
** Drops its spawn egg upon death.
* [[File:Mashacre Render.png|32px]] Mashacre
** Hostile and bigger version of mutato.
** Has {{hp|100}} health points and {{hp|20}} damage points.
** Attacks mutatos.
** Has a chance of dropping a Jumbo Red Poisonous Potato.
